question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you use for your job. Write a letter to the shop or company which supplied the equipment. In your letter -describe the problem with the equipment -explain how this problem is affecting your work -say what you want the shop or company to do
text: I am writing this letter to bring your attention to the malfunctioning of the laptop I bought from your shop two months ago.Actually, it worked smoothly for one month but then it started having battery problems. The laptop does not get charged 100% and is having short- battery life.

It has created a lot of issues for me.Firstly, it suddenly gets power off deleting all my unsaved files. There is a waste of a lot of time in making those files again. Moreover, I have to attend online classes and sudden shutting down interrupts my lessons. Sometimes, I miss a few important points which result in a poor understanding of the topic.
I would appreciate it if you send one of your employees to check my laptop and solve my problem. Further, I hope you will handle any kind of trouble in its functioning as it is under warranty.
I will be thankful to you.
